snippet.title: FC 24 | Official UEFA EURO 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
Everyone’s in. Play UEFA EURO 2024™ in FC 24 now.

Experience the European stage in a vibrant and authentic atmosphere in FC 24 with all 24 qualified teams, 9 authentic stadiums and an authentic matchday. Lead your nation to glory online, offline, live, and custom tournaments modes. Plus enjoy a full Festival of Football experience in FC Ultimate Team.

EA SPORTS FC™ 24 welcomes you to The World’s Game—the most true-to-football experience ever with HyperMotionV*, PlayStyles optimised by Opta, and an enhanced Frostbite™ Engine reinventing how 19,000+ authentic players move, play and look in every match. Learn more: http://x.ea.com/78195
 
Subscribe to see more from EA SPORTS FC™: http://bit.ly/pzw4VD
